plane.controllers

Class SelectPuzzleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • plane.controllers.SelectPuzzleController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class SelectPuzzleController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Respond to selection events in the Puzzle Plane, which has been configured to only allow individual rows to be selected.
